answers.answer: I had the same problem..then i started holding it because it gets cold. But i developed a uti. I just get up now. But stay awake all night.

Here's some advice on increased urination during pregnancy from the team at MedHelp:http://www.medhelp.org/pregnancy-health/articles/Increased-Urination-During-Pregnancy-Your-Symptoms-Manual/2091You can also find this in the I'm Expecting app by adding Urination as a symptom in the Pregnancy Diary then checking the Symptoms Manual from the menu.

question: So, my bladder isn't what it used to be and with every pregnancy it has gotten worse. Oh the joys! This time around, I find I am using the restroom sometimes 5 times a night. Before pregnancy I would go at least twice a night but I also drink a lot of water (I workout a lot as well).Anyone else finding the same? Its so frustrating! I just want to sleep.I have been tested for diabetes - all good there but ugh!
title: Constantly using the restroom
